summary: An Asian-American actor, living in Los Angeles, is forced to reconsider his roots as well as the possibilities afforded him by his present situation after suddenly inheriting his grandmother's home in Shanghai.
cast: Ken Leung|Hayden Panettiere|Kelly Hu|Joel David Moore|James Hong|Kathleen Lancaster|Lorna Scott|Spencer Redford|Steve Connell|Brian Gardner|Timothy Bottoms|Summer Altice|Oliver Yan|Byron Mann|Chen Li|Hu Qing Yun|Wenzai Gu|Michael Gleissner|Yun Xu|Sun Nian Sheng|Hui Xia Li|Xu Tuo|Huimin Xie|Cheng Ling|Qian Zuo Guo|Zhang Zhang|Ron Cobert|Julius Callahan|Cameron Markham|Carina Rhea
title: Shanghai Kiss
